Title: Lame Gretzky
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Adam F. Goldberg (creator), Chris Bishop, Stacey Harman (staff writer), Kristopher Valentine (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: As Murray (Jeff Garlin) struggles to get Adam (Sean Giambrone) interested in hockey, Beverly's (Wendi McLendon-Covey) efforts to help Erica (Hayley Orrantia) prepare for her college entrance exams threaten to backfire.
